content.rendered:
Dr. Shyamsundar Mohapatra International Foundation

SINCE 2009

Awards Received

ENGLAND

Dr. S.S Mohapatra (Member of Parliament Loksabha and Rajyasabha), as Mayor of London for a day, United Kingdom. Also seen are Dr. Radha devi (Wife) and Councillor Peter Smith.

ARGENTINA

Dr. S.S Mohapatra (Member of Parliament Loksabha and Rajyasabha), Receiving the highest award Al- Merito from the Govt. of Argentina and commendation certificate from the Home minister, Argentina.

NORWAY

Dr. S.S Mohapatra (Member of Parliament Loksabha and Rajyasabha), Receiving honorary citizenship of Norway and Key to Oslo from Mayor Per dillev- Simonsol (Mayor of Oslo), 1995

Dr. S.S Mohapatra (Member of Parliament Loksabha and Rajyasabha), Receiving the highest award from United nations and GCS international (South Korea), Registered as a biggest NGO with the ECOSOC of the United Nations. It may be mentioned here that GCS International is the founder of the International day of peace celebrations as designated by the United Nations through out the world. The award is named UN NGO medal of Ruby award and UN NGO sapphire award. it is given to those individuals who have rendered lifetime service for propagation of peace through out the world.

Dr. S.S Mohapatra (Member of Parliament Loksabha and Rajyasabha), for establishing diplomatic relationship between India and Israel. Receiving commendation plate from the Govt. of Israel through the Israel Embassy in India. It may be mentioned here 10 trees have been planted in the jeru salem hills in honor of Dr. S.S Mohapatra and are known as Mohapatra tress (India)

JAPAN

Dr. S.S Mohapatra (Member of Parliament Loksabha and Rajyasabha), Received golden peace prize from Soka University, Japan, 2001. The award was given in consideration for his life time contribution to establish peace in the world. He was the recommended for the award by the chief of Soka Gaggai Mr. Daisaku Ikkada and 87 world leaders including Presidents and Prime minister of various countries.

SOUTH KOREA

Posthumous commendation certificate to Dr. S.S Mohapatra (Member of Parliament Loksabha and Rajyasabha, President of GCS International) by Dr. Chung won Choue (President world GCS International and President world taekwon-do federation).

INDIA

Mahanadu N.T.R Birthday Award to Dr. S.S Mohapatra (Member of Parliament Loksabha and Rajyasabha ) by chief minister,Andhra Pradesh 1994.

INDIA

Dr. S.S Mohapatra (Member of Parliament Loksabha and Rajyasabha ) receiving the best statesman and parliamentarian award from Honorable Arjun Singh (union minister,Govt. of India)

MANY MORE TO ADD, THE PAGE IS UNDER CONSTRUCTION…
